dashboard.label: Timelapse Security Demo
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_TUg2KOpr":{"type":"viz.line","options":{"backgroundColor":"transparent","yAxisTitleText":"Mentions","yAxisLabelVisibility":"hide","xAxisTitleText":"Time","chart.nullValueMode":"connect"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_WHrM1O4Y"},"showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":true,"title":"Security Incidents (Over Time)"},"viz_UEhGvw3V":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","title":"Access Attempts from Expired Accounts","description":"","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_ZiNYEHy6"},"options":{"majorValue":"> sparklineValues|lastPoint()","trendValue":"> sparklineValues|delta(-3)","backgroundColor":"#93959a"}},"viz_FlneySsY":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","title":"Malware Detected","description":"End of Interval","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_GIY5rfzs"},"options":{"majorValue":"> sparklineValues|lastPoint()","trendValue":"> sparklineValues|delta(-3)","backgroundColor":"#282c36"}},"viz_8s75aj2w":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","title":"Data Exfiltration","description":"End of Interval","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_LVQiNjG2"},"options":{"majorValue":"> sparklineValues|lastPoint()","trendValue":"> sparklineValues|delta(-3)","backgroundColor":"#93959a"}},"viz_W3WKgh7s":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Buttercup Security Operations Center","textColor":"#93959a"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_WHrM1O4Y":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| makeresults count=180 
| streamstats count 
| eval Total = (random()%30) 
| eval _time=_time-(count*86400) 
 ```Total Expired Section``` 
| eval TotalExpired=case(count==173, 20, 1=1, Total) 
| eval TotalExpired=case(count==172, 38, 1=1, TotalExpired) 
| eval TotalExpired=case(count==171, 60, 1=1, TotalExpired) 
| eval TotalExpired=case(count==36, 30, 1=1, TotalExpired) 
| eval TotalExpired=case(count==35, 60, 1=1, TotalExpired) 
| eval TotalExpired=case(count==34, 60, 1=1, TotalExpired) 
| eval TotalExpired=case(count==126, 23, 1=1, TotalExpired) 
| eval TotalExpired=case(count==125, 56, 1=1, TotalExpired) 
| eval TotalExpired=case(count==124, 85, 1=1, TotalExpired) 
 ```Total Malware Section``` 
| eval TotalMalware=case(count==165, 48, 1=1, Total) 
| eval TotalMalware=case(count==29, 74, 1=1, TotalMalware) 
| eval TotalMalware=case(count==118, 63, 1=1, TotalMalware) 
 ```Total Data Exfil Section``` 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==165, 10, 1=1, Total) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==164, 30, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==163, 60, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==162, 60, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==161, 110, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==160, 140, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==159, 160, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==158, 190, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==157, 205, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==29, 30, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==28, 60, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==27, 60, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==26, 110, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==25, 140, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==24, 160, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==23, 190, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==22, 205, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==118, 23, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==117, 56, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==116, 85, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==115, 110, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==114, 162, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==113, 180, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==112, 210, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==111, 235, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| eval TotalDataExfil=case(count==110, 256, 1=1, TotalDataExfil) 
| rename TotalExpired as "Expired Account Access" 
| rename TotalMalware as "Malware Detected" 
| rename TotalDataExfil as "Data Exfiltration" 
| fields _time * 
| fields - count Total
| sort 0 + _time"},"name":"Security Incidents"},"ds_ZiNYEHy6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"timelapseMethod":"none","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| makeresults count=180 
| streamstats count 
| eval Total = (random()%10) 
| eval _time=_time-(count*86400) 
| eval Total=case(count==173, 20, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==172, 38, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==171, 60, 1=1, Total) 


| eval Total=case(count==36, 30, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==35, 60, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==34, 60, 1=1, Total) 



| eval Total=case(count==126, 23, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==125, 56, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==124, 85, 1=1, Total) 

| fields _time, Total 
| rename Total as "Total Incidents" 
| sort 0 + _time"},"name":"Search_2"},"ds_GIY5rfzs":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| makeresults count=180 
| streamstats count 
| eval Total = (random()%10) 
| eval _time=_time-(count*86400) 
| eval Total=case(count==165, 48, 1=1, Total) 



| eval Total=case(count==29, 74, 1=1, Total) 



| eval Total=case(count==118, 63, 1=1, Total) 

| fields _time, Total 
| rename Total as "Total Incidents" 
| sort 0 + _time"},"name":"Search_3"},"ds_LVQiNjG2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| makeresults count=180 
| streamstats count 
| eval Total = (random()%30) 
| eval _time=_time-(count*86400) 
| eval Total=case(count==165, 10, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==164, 30, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==163, 60, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==162, 60, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==161, 110, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==160, 140, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==159, 160, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==158, 190, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==157, 205, 1=1, Total)


| eval Total=case(count==29, 30, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==28, 60, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==27, 60, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==26, 110, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==25, 140, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==24, 160, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==23, 190, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==22, 205, 1=1, Total)


| eval Total=case(count==118, 23, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==117, 56, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==116, 85, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==115, 110, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==114, 162, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==113, 180, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==112, 210, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==111, 235, 1=1, Total) 
| eval Total=case(count==110, 256, 1=1, Total)
| fields _time, Total 
| rename Total as "Total Incidents" 
| sort 0 + _time"},"name":"Search_4"}},"defaults":{},"inputs":{},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","backgroundColor":"#000000"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_TUg2KOpr","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":360,"w":1140,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_UEhGvw3V","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":130,"w":360,"h":210}},{"item":"viz_FlneySsY","type":"block","position":{"x":420,"y":130,"w":360,"h":210}},{"item":"viz_8s75aj2w","type":"block","position":{"x":810,"y":130,"w":360,"h":210}},{"item":"viz_W3WKgh7s","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":20,"w":430,"h":50}}],"globalInputs":[]},"description":"","title":"Timelapse Security Demo"}
